content.rendered:
It’s time to put the interests of the people above political games.

For too long, the filibuster in the U.S. Senate has held our democracy hostage, enabling a small minority of Senators to block action on critical issues facing our nation, from gun control and abortion rights to climate action, labor movement protections and voting rights. Time and again, we have seen a radical minority of Senators block life-saving legislations supported by supermajorities of Americans.

Hill understands that our nation will never truly be a democracy until increasingly radical minorities are stripped of the power to hold the entire country back from realizing our full potential. Hill understands that unless we fix what’s broken in the U.S. Senate, our chances of making real progress on every issue we care about are slim. That’s why Hill will be the 51st vote to end the filibuster threatening women’s rights, voting rights, and progress on nearly every issue facing our nation.
